channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
im a good coder but i cannot host because of i have a really bad pc and i cant portforward my router because i do not know the password and i dont want to reset my router.
so i have a hoster but the problem is i want to acsses the files 24/7 but he cant trust me with teamviewer so is there any way which i can share the files with him. and it has to update for example
so i just coded my server and i sent uploaded it and my hoster downloaded it next day im playing when my hoster is not online and someone reports a bug to me how can i fix it? so how can i acsses just the files of my hosters comp? so basiccaly i want to share the file but it has to keep updaiting.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Yes, update the old source from your community. Once everything youâ€™ve added is correctly done, send him the files and tell him to start hosting that server.

Read full topic
